pullrequest.title: Add support for setting up an OpenStack cloud via Vagrant

content.raw: Thanks. I'll rewrite it to mention that the VM installs OpenStack Grizzly and that it's actually not a requirement. Regarding enabling the VT-x extensions in the BIOS, did you get any error messages from Vagrant/VirtualBox when testing this branch with VT-x disabled? I'll add a troubleshooting section with any issues that users may encounter.
content.html: Thanks. I'll rewrite it to mention that the VM installs OpenStack Grizzly and that it's actually not a requirement. Regarding enabling the VT-x extensions in the BIOS, did you get any error messages from Vagrant/VirtualBox when testing this branch with VT-x disabled? I'll add a troubleshooting section with any issues that users may encounter.
